Author: anathebasic
Text: Eat!! I keep seeing that whole "pain is temporary, GPA is forever" saying going around which I feel like for most people refers to lack of sleep but for us I take it more as "gain is temporary, GPA is forever". This is a mental illness and no matter how you feel about it now, there may come a day that you will want to recover, and you'll be happy that you wouldn't have lost grades/oppurtunities to this. Good luck and start slow, try to intuitively eat if that's a possibility for you :)
